description.narrative: Increase the shelter options/solutions for IDPs by providing prefab and collective shelter units alsocompleting/converting unfinished buildings to accommodate families temporarily. This includes unfinished public buildings/warehouses that are already occupied by IDP families or may fit that purpose. This approach will ensure that adequate space is provided with cultural considerations providing separate living spaces for women and men. Also Cash support for rent Identifying buildings that can be used as collective shelters and suitable for accommodating IDP families to be rented to secure quick and proper accommodation.

participating-org.narrative: Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: IDP families are provided with single family Prefab Shelter Units (PSU) or Collective Prefab Shelter (CPS) on allocated public land within urban/semi urban areas in the defined cities, job opportunities for IDPs are created and appropriate tenure security is guaranteed. Basic WASH facilities are installed for each unit
